data.text: Ezɨ Teman nguibamɨn gumazim Elifas, Jopɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨam ikarvasi:
“E gumazir kɨniba, e ti Godɨn akurvaghsɨ, bizibar amuam o? Puvatɨgham.
Nɨ ti ghaze, nɨ Godɨn damazimɨn derazir arazim, Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itimɨn akuraghtɨ, a uan ingangarim damuam o?
Egh nɨ Godɨn apengan ikɨva an ziam fɨtɨ,
Jop, nɨ arazir kurar avɨribagh ami,
“Nɨ arazir kabagh ami. Nɨn akar gumaziba nɨ ko akam akɨrigh biziba inigh, ua da ikarvagham.
Kuariba pɨrir gumazamiziba, nɨ dɨpaba me ganɨdir puvatɨ.
Nɨ gumazir ekiar ziam itim, kamaghɨn amizɨ nɨ ghaze, nɨ uan ifongiamɨn bizibar amuam. Egha nɨ gumazir igharazibar nguazir akuar maba ini.
Ezɨ amizir odiarir paba ovengeziba, iza uarir akurvaghasa nɨn azangsɨsi, ezɨ nɨ men akurvazir pu.
Nɨn arazir kaba bangɨn, bizir nɨn suigha nɨ gasɨghasɨghiziba otivigha bar moghɨra nɨ ekɨarugha,
Mati mɨtarmer ekiam nɨ avarazɨ, nɨ bizitamɨn garir puvatɨ,
“Jop, nɨ mɨkovezir bar pɨn itibar gan.
Bizir kam nɨn nɨghnɨzim gamima, nɨ ti kamaghɨn mɨgei,
“Jop, nɨ manmaghɨn ami? Nɨ ti tuavir ghurir kuramɨn mangasa gavgafi?
Me tɨghar ghuram, God zuamɨra me agefi.
Gumazir kaba kamaghɨn God mɨgei, ‘Nɨ e ategh mangɨ.’
Egha me kamaghɨn fozir puvatɨ God uabɨ me ataghizɨ me bizir aghuir avɨriba isi.
Gumazamizir Godɨn damazimɨn deraziba gari, God ivezir kuram gumazir kurabagh anɨdima, me bar akonge.
Me kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘Bar dera. En apanir kaba ikuvigha gɨfa.
“Jop, nɨ oragh. Nɨ datɨrɨghɨn God ko akam akɨrigh,
An aghuzir akar a nɨ danɨngamiba, nɨ bar ada inigh,
Nɨ uamategh Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itim bagh izɨtɨ,
Kamaghɨn deragham, nɨ kantrin Ofirɨn inizir golɨn bar aghuiba isɨ,
Egh nɨ Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itim ateghtɨ,
Nɨ kamaghɨn damigh, egh Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itim deravɨra nɨ gamizir bizim bagh bar akuegham.
Nɨ God ko mɨkɨmtɨ, a nɨ baragh egh bizir nɨ an azangsɨziba nɨ danɨngam.
Egh nɨ bizir manam damuasa nɨghnɨsi, God nɨ ateghtɨ,
Nɨ fo, gumazamizir uan ziaba feba, God me abɨri,
E fo, God gumazamizibar garima, me an damazimɨn bar zue, ezɨ a men akurvasi.
